segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing water is surely damaging the cabinets below the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That beautiful wooden floor will be warped and stained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children's cookie raid adds another layer of risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool tips, it could lead to a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Broken dishes, bruises, tears – it’s all too probable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman will certainly be upset when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't imagine how much mess she'll have to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch all these hazards unfold simultaneously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone stopping this impending catastrophe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The innocent domestic setting is completely undermined by these unaddressed dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is just infuriatingly negligent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already picture the chaos that will ensue.
segments.speaker: PAR
